1.content:
Steve, the 21 year old golden retriever, went back to his college dorm all bruised and scratched. He had another encounter with the jocks again. They liked to pick on him since his passion was science and was known to make crazy experiments. People actually called him a mad scientist. Steve walked to his bed reflecting on his life.

Steve really believed he needed to change in order for acceptance. He dreamed of having actually friends and actual girls liking him. Steve spent the day in his calculating on how to be accepted. His mind always went back to the jocks. They had all they anyone could dream of: fame, glory, popularity. Steve shrugged that thought out his head. There was no way he could be jock since he was puny and already had the reputation of a mad science geek. He then wished to himself, "If only I were bigger; then people would respect me."

At that moment, Steve's brain started making connections. Steve stood up putting facts, theories, and formulas togethermin his head. He grinned from ear to ear with an idea that could not just change him but the world. He ran out of his dorm across campus and made his way to the science building. He then ran downstairs into his personal lab that his science professor allowed him to use. Steve put on his lab coat and went to work.

Steve spent sleepless nights working with the thoughts he came up with and a design for a mechanical object: a nanobot. If he theories were correct, the nanobots would be able to infuse with a multi-cellular specimen giving it more muscle mass. Steve could have the power of a jock within seconds! He was so excited that he didn't get any sleep until the prototype was complete.

Steve finally finished the nanobots but wasn't sure if they were safe. So, he borrowed some lab mice from upstairs and began to test his theory. He got out a syringe filled with the nanobots and injected them into a mouse. At first, the mouse seemed fine. No difference in size was noticed. Steve slumped his head in disappointment. He was so sure that it would work. He needed it to work. However, his disappointment was short lived when he saw the mouse grow to the size of a large rat! Steve jumped for joy!

Steve was right! His life was no longer going to be filled with bullying and teasing. He now had to power to literally alter his life. Steve was over enthusiastic that he decided that it was enough testing. He rolled up his sleeve, got out another syringe filled with nanobots, and pushed them into his furry skin.
1.title: Steve the mad scientist

choices: Steve goes to the campus gym.
Steve goes to a frat party.
12.content:
Steve was so excited, his heart was practically leaping out of his chest. If it worked on the rat, it would probably work on him! He felt a cool chill as he removed the syringe from his arm.

However, he knew that the nanobots' effect wouldn't work right away. He had used a slightly different formula then he had with the rat. Though the rat grew instantaneously, he had a remote that would cause him to grow.

He sprinted over to his workbench, almost tripping over various objects in his eagerness. Managing to reach it intact, Steve picked the remote up and examined it. He had made it look like a regular watch so people wouldn't notice it and he wouldn't lose it. Having made sure that all of the parts were in place, Steve latched it around his wrist.

Steve stared at the shiny silver remote. He could activate it by twisting the knob on the side, which would move the dial on the watch up a setting, causing muscle growth. No one would think it was odd to see someone just twisting a knob on their watch. It was perfect.

Steve needed to try out the device, and there was only one person he could try it out on: himself. Both excited and nervous that something might go wrong, Steve carefully took off his shirt, not wanting to rip it if he got too big.

Now all Steve had to do was decide how many times to turn the knob. If something went wrong, he didn't want it to be too major, plus people might notice if he hulked out overnight, so he decided to only turn it up a little bit. His hand shaking at his scientific breakthrough, Steve turned the watch to it's first setting and waited.

It only took a few seconds for the nanobots to take effect. Steve felt horridly cold before a soft, warm feeling took over. However, that too didn't last long before Steve was overcome by an intense but still enjoyable sensation.

Finally, the muscle growth commenced. With his shirt off, Steve was able to watch in awe as his biceps swelled up a bit, starting out as a barely noticeable bump and working its way up to a large mound of flesh, bigger than a lot of the guys on campus. His pecs pushed out of his chest, defining themselves and then going an inch or two more. Steve continued to be amazed as his stomach formed six perfect abdominal muscles, all clearly visible even if he was wearing a shirt. He felt his quads and calves push out against his jeans, straining them a lot.

Finally, the growth was over and Steve was left to gaze at the results. "IT WORKED! IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!!" he cried out, jumping around with joy. Steve walked over to a mirror and looked at himself. He looked more like a fitness model than himself.

Steve finally had the muscles he always wanted. Now he only had to decide what to do with them...
12.title: He grows by remote control

choices: Steve meets the agent at the college gym
Steve goes out to show off at girls
125.content:
Steve spent the next hour in his lab simply admiring himself. He posed and flexed until he was exhaused. Steve didn't want to show off just yet because he was worried about people getting suspicious around him. To cover up his secret, he put his lab coat back on. The buttons were hard button over his new and massive chest. He walked back upstairs in public and hopes that nobody notices him.

Steve passed the gym as he made his way to his dorm. He saw a sign outside the door that said: "Modeling Tryouts. Get a career by showing off!" Steve was compelled to peek through the door to see what was going on. He suddenly felt burning passion pumping through his heart.

He saw cameras, flashes, and muscular people in the room. Steve saw some of the jocks standing and flexing in front of the cameras. A whole line of big people followed. Steve thought that modeling would be PERFECT for him. This would give him a great opportunity to test his new device further and get the respect he craved. Only one problem: The competition. Steve saw the candidates were bigger than he was. He looked at his watch and smirked.

Steve ran to the nearest bathroom to find it deserted. He ran into the first stall he saw and looked down to his watch. "I hope this works a second time!" Steve thought to himself. He turned a couple more notches on the watch and slammed it hard. He instantly felt the same warmth from the first time but was more intense. The lab coat grew tighter and tighter until flesh erupted from the seems and the buttons flew like rockets. Steve's calves and thighs grew thicker and stronger and Steve could've sworn he felt a jolt in his height. After what seemed forever to Steve, the warmth ceased.

Steve squeezed out of the stalls and his jaw dropped to the floor when he saw the mirror. He saw the reflection of a titan! It stood at least 6'5" with bulging muscles all over his body. Steve flexed his arm and fell in love with it when he saw big and veiny. He stepped out of the bathroom with just his torn pants and walked to the gym.

Steve found the place with no line. The cameras were being packed up and a female panther was turned away from the door. "Excuse me," said Steve in a deeper voice, "Is this the modeling tryouts?" "It was," Said the panther, "We're done for today." Steve's heart dropped. This was his big moment to make his dreams come true. It couldn't be over.
"Please ma'am do you have time for one more?"
"I'm sorry sir, but we're.." The panther turned around and saw the god of a man in front of her. She was mesmerized by Steve's muscles and face which looked more tough and masculine from the growth. "Uhh..sure," She said, "I guess I have time for one more." She told her crew to get the cameras out again and Steve's golden moment began.

Steve didn't know what to do exactly so he just started making every pose he could think of. Every time he flexed he was blinded by flashes and couldn't see the grin on the panter's face. She was glad she gave him a chance. She thought he was a little rough around the edges but had potential. The cameras finally stopped but the spots in Steve's vision didn't.

"That was really good!" Said the panther, "I'll let you know about my decision tomorrow morning." "Ok," Said Steve, "Hope to see you soon!" He waved his giant arm to her and left the gym. Steve flexed his arm in victory. He knew he caught that agent's attention and would difinitely hear from her soon. He had a modeling career in his future.
125.title: A modeling agent spots Steve.

choices: Steve goes to the modeling session
1251.content:
The next morning, Steve got a letter from the modeling agent to meet with her at the college gym. He knew then that she chose him to be a model. He was so excited that he almost overlooked that fact that he needed new clothes. Steve thought that torn pants wouldn't be appropriate since they were most likely going to be talking about business so he went to the gym early to buy gym clothes. Once he tried them in the bathroom, Steve looked amazing. His new blue muscle shirt greatly shaped his gigantic chest to show his 8-pack and massive pecs. The gym shorts he bought rippled along with his thighs. Before he could get lost in himself, it was time to meet with the agent.

Steve walked out of the bathroom to find the female panther sitting at a nearby table and waving at him. He came to her position and grabbed a chair near her which squeaked under his huge weight. "I'm glad you got my message." Said the agent excitedly. "I'm sorry I never got your name." "Steve," Said Steve, "Steve Conners."
"Nice to meet you Steve. I'm Ms. Mioko."
The meeting went very well. Ms. Mioko was very impressed with Steve's story about himself even though Steve had to twist the truth a little bit. He told her that he was picked on for being a nerd and decided to work out so the bullies would stop. Ms. Mioko said it was good to see a model that had both brains and brawn. The more Steve talked, the more Ms. Mioko wanted him to model for her.

Ms. Mioko's eyes glanced away from Steve for a second to see other people using the gym equipment. It gave her an idea. "Say Steve," She said, "Why don't you show me how strong you are? You look the part but can you play the part?" Steve turned around and saw the intimidating tools the students were using. He grew nervous at the sight of muscular people lifting twice their own weight. Ms. Mioko asked a very good question he thought. Steve hoped that the nanobots were up to the challenge.

"Sure," Said Steve, "I can show you." Ms. Mioko followed Steve into the weight room. The dumbbells caught Steve's attention first. He wanted to start somewhere light but he knew the nanobots could withstand some strength. Steve picked up the 100 lbs. first. He did several reps to find they were pretty easy. He put them down and picked 400 lbs. dumbbells. Once again, they were too light. Steve finally met his match when he picked up the 600 lbs. ones. He made 20 reps before putting them down and turned to Ms. Mioko. "That was pretty impressive." Said Ms. Mioko trying to contain her joy. "What else can you do?"

Steve then saw the bench across the gym with heavy weights already attached to each end of the bar. He didn't know how much it was but he did know it was more than the dumbbells. Steve got on the bench, placed his meaty hands under the bar, and pushed. After each rep, Ms. Mioko saw Steve's arms and chest increase under the stress. She loved the sight of it. After 10 reps, Steve got up. "That was amazing!" Said Ms. Mioko unable to hold her enthusiasm, "You're in!"

Steve couldn't believe his ears. He was accepted to fulfill his dream of being admired. Steve grinned from ear to ear and shook Ms. Mioko's hand. "Thank you!" He exclaimed. "No, thank you." Ms. Mioko replied. Ms. Mioko told Steve that she will inform him of his first modeling session later on. She left with both her and Steve grinning. Steve flexed a bicep to her charming her and thinking to himself that he was glad of making the nanobots.
1251.title: Steve meets the agent at the college gym

15.content: What kind of work out would he like to do?
15.title: He grows while working out

choices: He continued to work out other body parts
151.content:
For his whole life, Steve had longed for this moment and he could not wait any longer. He knew that the nanobots would start promoting muscle growth, but its progress could be hasten by working out. He decided to do some push-ups and see how effective the nanobots was.

After 3 reps, Steve was struggling to push himself up from the ground due to his lacking of physical strength. However, after a few exertion, he felt blood rushed into his chest and arms, and suddenly he gained a surge of strength to push himself up again from the ground. The following reps was getting easier, and soon he had successfully done 20 reps, which was impossible before he had injected himself with the nanobots. His form was getting better while he was continuing doing push-ups and without realizing, he had already done more than 100 reps. Steve was totally surprised that he was not tired at all and he felt that he could do it all the day. However, he thought that it was already enough and he decided to stop the push-ups and did some checking to himself.

Steve stood up from the floor and felt the most incredible pump in his chest and arms area. He could not help himself but immediately started touching his chest. To his amazement, he could actually feel his pecs, which was totally non-existent before! He could not believe that it was true and started to remove his lab coat so that he could have a real look on it. He was totally exhilarated when he saw his own pecs pushed out from his previously concave chest for the very first time. Those pecs were no where as big as the jock's in the college, but yet they were striated! He swore he could actually see every muscle fiber through the paper-thin-skin. The little flab on his chest was totally melted away after doing the push-ups. He tried to flex his pecs and overwhelmed with excitement when he saw his pecs jumping up and down.

"IT WORKED! IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!!" he cried out, jumping around with joy.

What would he doing next?
151.title: He starts doing push-ups

choices: He decides to go to a gym to have a more intense work out
155.title: Others

info.brief_description: A geeky golden retriever found the secret to growing big within seconds!

Have fun!
